title: Normal games lane positions
body:
I would like for normal games to be given the same feature that ranked games have, far to many times i have to deal with players either instalocking, queue dodging or even forcing others out of their lanes, if this feature gets added i know it would make waiting times a bit longer but given that we have to either wait a long time to even play to begin with or can't enjoy a game due to players instalocking or forcing others out i think it's a small price to pay.

I know there is a good chance that riot will ignore this but i would very much like this feature added to normal games as it will make it so much easier.

replies.body: I wish that this feature gets added to Normal pvp games too (like when you click find match in normal pvp it asks you to select two roles), so that all the League of Legends players have a better chance of getting the role they wanted. It is such a frustrating thing if you have been forced into a role that you are not good at.

Other regions have it, but they also have blind pick.  The population on here means we can either have one ranked queue type or the other.  

I suspect they might change it to role pick except for the support issue and the fact that no jungler is common in sub lvl 30 games.  

Supports are sucking less to play every year, so that's improving.  When they take the kill/death distinction out I might even want to play them myself on occasions.  The trick about what to do with games below lvl 30 with no jungler might be tricky though (if we only had ranked draft).

We'd also get complaints from the mains of temporarily overpowered or terribly unfun to face champions that they couldn't play their mains even in normals.
